actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to encourage each public housing agency to have at least one resident of a public housing project as a member of the governing board of such agency.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to encourage each public housing agency to include at least one resident of a low-income housing project as a member of its governing board.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to encourage each public housing agency to have at least one resident of a public housing project as a member of the governing board of such agency.
